title: Typographica
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Blogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blogs) : Typographica**

Founded in May 2002, Typographica was one of the first "blogs" to focus primarily on typography. The site was very active for many years until a dry spell in 2005-06 when software issues and time constraints limited new content. In July 2007, Typographica marked a reawakening with its annual [review of the year's new fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typographica.org/001103.php).

Typographica is edited by [Stephen Coles](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephen%20Coles) and [Joshua Lurie-Terrell](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Lurie-Terrell). Contributors include [Mark Simonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Simonson), [Yves Peters](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Yves%20Peters), [John Butler](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Butler), [Dan Reynolds](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dan%20Reynolds), [John Hudson](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Hudson), [Joe Clark](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joe%20Clark), [Ben Kiel](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ben%20Kiel), [Stephen Moye](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephen%20Moye), and [Grant Hutchinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Grant%20Hutchinson)

[typographica.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235503/http:/typographica.org/)
author: dan_reynolds
